text: @realDonaldTrump Well, maybe because the mismanaged RED states already raided the coffers that were replenished ANNUALLY for their multiple flooding, tornadoes, hurricanes & oh yeah...that border wall that didn't seem to keep out COVID19 even though it didn't have a passport to enter the country.
